introduction: SYNOPSISJung Kang-il is a consumer electronics repairman. After finishing his duties abroad, he returns to Korea to discover that the fiancee he trusted has already left him. Kang-il is wandering about looking for his fiancee when he meets a woman named Shin Chae-won. He gets a vague feeling of the true meaning of life from her. But then by chance, Kang-il gets entangled in something that his fiancee is involved in. He needs Chae-won to come forward and provide his alibi. Kang-il sacrifices himself and denies that he was with Chae-won because he's found love for the first time and wants to protect Chae-won without breaking up her family. Chae-won is in agony. She is torn between her family and the truth. In the end, Chae-won reveals that she was with Kang-il, providing him an alibi.故事他是一个试图通过学习电子维修技术而热切地生活的年轻人。但是当他从海外工程师的使命中回来的时候，他的未婚妻已经离开了他。刚毅在这里跑来跑去找她。那时我遇见了一个名叫新蔡元的女人，从她身上我感受到了人与人生意义的淡薄。但是，在一个涉及未婚妻未婚妻的偶然事件中，有必要把新家乡的新故乡夷为平地。“中港日”否认了这个事实，那就是与申善院在一起，为了他最初感受到的爱和新蔡元的家庭和解而献出了自己的牺牲。新的花园很痛苦。一直担心家人和真相的申先生，告诉警方，他一天都呆在这里。
